showScoreExcerpt:
"Forest Whitaker, on stage here for the first time in decades, does offer a convincing portrayal of Erie...But there is a deep seam of charismatic pathos within this role that Whitaker never fully mines...It can be easy to drift off at times...Director Michael Grandage might have pushed his star a little harder...We are desperate to believe in what is happening on stage even when it disappoints. Grandageâ€™s 'Hughie' does just enough to sustain that bleak vision."
